class_notes: Online asynchronous with face-to-face intensives dates: July 12-15.
course_description: This course expands on the role of the student neonatal nurse practitioner in management, assessment, differential diagnoses, comprehensive care and management across the continuum (acute-critical-chronic care), for high risk and critically ill neonates/infants up to two years of age.
prerequisites: NRSG 556 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1867, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
